Severity and Location of Traffic Accidents in the U.S.

We will investigate a dataset based on U.S. traffic accidents from February 2016 to December 2019. We will look into questions about which areas of the U.S. have the most incidents and which areas of the U.S. have the most severe accidents. These areas can be investigated on different levels for state, city, county and exact location. Additionally, we can investigate the relation between the duration of these accidents with severity and location. Since the dataset is large, if we have problems with runtime we will investigate specifically for Iowa.

https://www.kaggle.com/sobhanmoosavi/us-accidents
